name: workly
description: A really simple way to move a stand-alone function/class to a web worker.

scripts.build: npm run build-d && npm run build-umd
scripts.build-d: rollup index.js --o dist/workly.js --f iife --name "workly" && npm run minify-d
scripts.build-umd: rollup index.js --o dist/workly.umd.js --f umd --name "workly" && npm run minify-umd

author: Preet Shihn <preetshihn@gmail.com>
